title: [Medicine] The first severe COVID-19 patient successfully treated with human recombinant soluble ACE2 (hrsACE2), with disappearance of coronavirus swiftly from the serum, nasal cavity and lungs, and a reduction of inflammatory cytokine levels, leading to a significant clinical improvement

[Psychology] Personality trait data from 31 countries at both nation-level and individual-level shows that 'agreeable nations' are most consistently compliant with COVID lockdown measures, while individuals highest in extraversion across nations are less likely to shelter in place, expressing a need to go out
